title: In surprise move, U.S. and China vow to work together on climate change
content:
1. In surprise move, U.S. and China vow to work together on climate change  NBC News
  2. COP26: China and US agree to boost climate co-operation  BBC News
  3. U.S., China unveil surprise deal on climate change  Reuters
  4. What Happened at COP26 on Wednesday: China and U.S. Say They’ll ‘Enhance’ Climate Ambition  The New York Times
  5. Takeaways from Wednesday at COP26: China and US surprise summit, negotiations heat up, car deal flops  CNN
contentSnippet:
In surprise move, U.S. and China vow to work together on climate change  NBC News

localize.title: 米国と中国が気候変動問題での協力を約束するという驚きの行動に出る
